description: CSTR is an identifier for Common Science and Technology Resources, to provide persistent identification services for the positioning, traceability, citation, statistics and evaluation of science and technology resources.
name: CSTR

resources.description: CSTR Identification Platform（https://www.cstr.cn/en）is initialed in 2016 based on the National Standard GB/T 32843—2016 "Science and technology resource identification", providing unique identification service for global scientific data, papers, scientific institutions, researchers, scientific instruments, patents and other scientific and technological resources. CSTR is also accepted as the international standard, such as IANA., etc.

institution.description: Computer Network Information Center (CNIC) of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) has a long history of providing network, computing and data services to the research community and science outreach services to the general public.
institution.name: Computer Network Information Center, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, China.

resources.name: CSTR Identification Platform
